errors.error_description: States the package requires Python 2.7 which is outdated and incorrect for modern brightway2-io
correction_candidates: The package requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.7+ for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.6 or later for optimal performance
The package requires Python 3.9 or later for optimal performance
errors.golden_answer: The package requires Python 3.8 or later for optimal performance
